name: Userlytics
description:
Welcome to the Userlytics Plugin for Adobe XD! 
The Userlytics Plugin allows you to easily configure and create a user experience test directly from your XD prototype so you can watch and listen to your target Persona interact with and answer questions. 
Filter by demographic criteria or use your own participants. 
Don't have a Userlytics account? 
Create one right now for free and receive a free test credit: 
https://www.userlytics.com/client-signup 
Do you need extra credits? Please purchase them in your dashboard: 
https://www.userlytics.com/client
releaseNotes: Fixed bugs with credentials in Windows as well as Mac. Fixed modal size. Compatible with Adobe XD v22
author: Userlytics Corporation
